pages.text: $(info) $(item)Stone Rocks$() can be found on the ground in most areas.$(p)$(info) $(item)Rocks$() can be found when mining with low tier tools.$(p)$(info) They can also be crafted on an $(item)Anvil$().

If you ever find yourself under attack - $(italic)a phrase here which means subject to aggressive, violent, or harmful action$() - it would be wise to remember this:$(p)$(info) The act of throwing a $(item)Rock$() can also be an aggressive, violent, or harmful action.$(p)$(info) Placing a $(item)Rock$() to decorate a path, however, is not an aggressive, violent, or harmful action.
$(info) $(item)Limestone Rocks$() can be crafted on an $(item)Anvil$() and found when mining $(item)Limestone$() with low tier tools.$(p)$(todo)Filler
